problems.title: Palindrome Checker
problems.description: Write a function `isPalindrome` that takes a string as input and returns a boolean indicating whether the string is a palindrome. A palindrome reads the same backward as forward, ignoring case and non-alphabetic characters. Implement the function and ensure it passes all test cases provided in the main method.

problems.title: Fibonacci Calculator
problems.description:
Write a function `fibonacci` that takes an integer `n` as input and returns the `n`th Fibonacci number. The Fibonacci sequence is defined as:
- Fibonacci(0) = 0
- Fibonacci(1) = 1
- Fibonacci(n) = Fibonacci(n-1) + Fibonacci(n-2) for n >= 2

Implement the function and ensure it passes all test cases provided in the main method.

problems.title: Factorial Calculator
problems.description:
Write a function `factorial` that takes a non-negative integer `n` as input and returns the factorial of `n`. The factorial of `n` is defined as:
- Factorial(0) = 1
- Factorial(n) = n * Factorial(n-1) for n > 0

Implement the function and ensure it passes all test cases provided in the main method.
